name: A Walk Through Echoes (itch)
description:
OVERVIEW

Accompany an old blind man on his journey in this very challenging auditory platformer game. Take part in his struggles as you test your precision platforming skills, reflexes, memory, and puzzle solving in order to progress.

GAMEPLAY

Listen for the distinct auditory cues created by platforms and switch between four character "memories" which allow you to complete various challenges. 

OTHER FEATURES

Light story elements

Original sountrack 

Full controller support

Secret ending
